<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as required by NaCl&#39;s SFI sandbox.  It inserts address-masking instructions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// before dangerous control-flow and memory access instructions.  It inserts</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// address-masking instructions after instructions that change the stack</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pointer.  It ensures that the mask and the dangerous instruction are always</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// emitted in the same bundle.  It aligns call + branch delay to the bundle end,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// so that return address is always aligned to the start of next bundle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
